text: Yun Yen is a Taiwanese scientist, focusing in cancer research and translational medicine, currently at Taipei Medical University and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Taiwanese scientists Category:Thomas Jefferson University alumni Category:21st-century Chinese scientists Category:Taipei Medical University faculty
title: Yun Yen
